about_the_game:
This demo includes the first level of "Cyborg City", where Jax fights his way through the  Scrapyard using Bullet Time and Jetpack.

BULLET TIME

🔵 Activate Bullet Time to execute thrilling kills and see the Iron Heads' guts explode, the raw smell of iron, lead, and glory. Each blast in Bullet Time is a brutal spectacle, with Iron Heads ripped apart in the jaws of the T-Rex Titan Beast.

JETPACK

🔵 Blast into the sky with Jetpack and shooting enemies down below, dodging all 12 missiles from Bluto's mech, seeing crisp trails of blazing heat and smoke passing by from the bazooka.

SKILL TREE

🔵 Craft your own legend. Slaughter Titan Cobra and thousands of Eyeball Spiders from a selection of 20+ abilities and 60+ upgrades, mastering auto-aim, unleashing full damage, unlocking unlimited Bullet Time and Jetpack.

WEAPONS

🔵 Burn thousands of Rats alive with the Flamethrower. Equip and upgrade the deadliest weapons: Missiles, Gatling Gun, Katana, and Bazooka, to rain hell full of lead for those who dare stand in your way.

ARMOR

🔵 Customize your armor from head to toe, with each piece enhancing and increasing your Bullet Time, Firepower, or Jetpack skills. In full Titan Tech armor made with the latest Cyborg City technology available, Samurai's katana won’t leave a scratch.

BOSSES

🔵 Face against Rig Lord's Beast, a raging T-Rex with a Bite that shreds steel and a Tail Whip that flattens everything in its path. Hordes of Rats and Spiders pour in like a living flood, the massive Titan Cobra shooting green laser beams, Samurai’s katana slicing through the air, and missile mech Bluto—the ultimate threat to Cyborg City.

PURE COMBAT

🔵 No Point A-to-B grind or fetch tasks, dive straight to the action.

THE WORLD

Year 2225. New York.

The Sun has burned the oceans dry. The air is poisoned and no longer clean. Fresh water is a currency worth more than life, fought over with blood and bullets. Every day is a brutal fight, for just a little.

Nations fell long ago, leaving towers of high-tech cities made of steel and circuits. Flesh replaced with metal, minds wired with code, to compete against nature, against AI, and against others just as desperate. And you've heard the stories. There’s a place. A hope, a dream.

They call it,

Cyborg City.

TORCH-SHAPED CYBORG CITY

Cyborg City is about 17 times the Statue of Liberty's height, with 7 Zones:

🔵 Zone 0: The Cyborg City Council HQ, the nerve center where the City Ruler controls everything. The only place in the world where you can see green grass and trees, with water-flowing fountains.

🔵 Zone 1: Residential area for citizens, with housing, schools, and hospitals, and luxurious residentials for VIP only.

🔵 Zone 2: The Entertainment District, full of stadiums, a gladiator arena, malls, clubs, theaters, and restaurants.

🔵 Zone 3: Manufacturing artificial water, food, and precious air—resources that citizens of Cyborg City have to pay for to live there.

🔵 Zone 4: Titan Factories, where the city's most advanced cyborgs and weapon systems are created.

🔵 Zone 5: Medusa's Cathedral overlooks the Common Factories and Black Market, where secret deals take place.

🔵 Zone 6: Under the Statue of Liberty's feet are a scrapyard and shipyard crawling with Iron Heads, surrounded by oil rigs and sewer systems.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes depictions of violence.

name: Cyborg City Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 21 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Not applicable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER or Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 21 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Not applicable

short_description: Year 2225. Step into Cyborg City, a cyborg-apocalyptic world where Jax fights to survive from the Scrapyard up to Cyborg City. Using Bullet Time, Jetpack, and Upgrades to destroy enemies, he is avenging his family and saving the girl he loves in this third-person shooter.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
